channel.title: Giving SkillCapes level reqs. Can anyone really help me out with this?
channel.description:
Thanks for all that help people!
Now all I am looking for is to change the level reqs for SkillCapes!
P.S. your all mentioning packet 41... How do you get to that and what is that?
Please help guys!

item.title: Giving SkillCapes level reqs. Can anyone really help me out with this?
item.dc:creator: @Kyle11594 Kyle11594
item.description:
@Kyle11594 wrote:

Idk how to do his codes

When I made my own… They compiled fine. But didn’t work. So no use editing his! lol.

Read full topic

item.source: Giving SkillCapes level reqs. Can anyone really help me out with this?

item.title: Giving SkillCapes level reqs. Can anyone really help me out with this?
item.dc:creator: @Kyle11594 Kyle11594
item.description:
@Kyle11594 wrote:

T[quote=“inuyasha 12345, post:25, topic:170948”]Go into client.java, search for CLAttack untill you see something like this

/*Equipment level checking*/ public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 14073) { return 99; }

the CLAttack part is the skill,
then the part about item id and return is the items

if (ItemID == ####) { //#### here = the item ID
return ##; // the return ## is the level required to wear it in the skill your under,
}

Here’s myn all up-tpdate with new silabs for atk and defence

/*Equipment level checking*/ public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 14073) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14074) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14075) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 4151) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 1325) { return 5; } if (ItemID == 1311) { return 5; } if (ItemID == 1327) { return 10; } if (ItemID == 1313) { return 10; } if (ItemID == 1329) { return 20; } if (ItemID == 1315) { return 20; } if (ItemID == 1331) { return 30; } if (ItemID == 1317) { return 30; } if (ItemID == 1333) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 1319) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 4587) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 7158) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 5698) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 4153) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 6739) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 3204) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 1249) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 1434) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 1377) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 1305) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 4718) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 4755) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 4710) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 4747) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 4726) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 15333) { return 75; } if (ItemID == 15334) { return 75; } if (ItemID == 15335) { return 75; } if (ItemID == 15336) { return 75; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("halberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Combat Cape")) { return 99; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 1; } } return 1; } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2008, 10:13:03 PM[/size][hr]DEFENCE

public int GetCLDefence(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 14079) {//def cape return 99; } if (ItemID == 3140) {//dragon chain return 60; } if (ItemID == 1149) {//d med return 60; } if (ItemID == 14080) {//def cape t return 99; } if (ItemID == 14081) {//def hood return 99; } if (ItemID == 4087) {//d legs return 60; } if (ItemID == 1197) {//mith kite return 20; } if (ItemID == 4585) {//d skirt return 60; } if (ItemID == 15195) {//d full helm return 60; } if (ItemID == 15352) {//d boots return 60; } if (ItemID == 1187) {//d sq return 60; } if (ItemID == 3122) {//granite sheild return 50; } if (ItemID == 6524) {//obby sheild return 60; } if (ItemID == 6809) {//g legs return 50; } if (ItemID == 4224) {//crystal sheild return 70; } if (ItemID == 2657) {//zammy helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2659) {//zam kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 2655) {//zam legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 3478) {//zam skirt return 40; } if (ItemID == 2653) {//zam pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2665) {//sara helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 3479) {//sara skirt return 40; } if (ItemID == 2667) {//sara kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 2663) {//sara legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 2661) {//sara pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2669) {//guthix pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2671) {//guthix legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 2673) {//guthix helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2675) {//guthix kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 3480) {//guthix skirt return 40; } if (ItemID == 2503) {//blk d hide body return 40; } if (ItemID == 4089) {//blue mystic hat return 20; } if (ItemID == 4091) {//blue mystic body return 20; } if (ItemID == 4093) {//blue mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4095) {//blue mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4097) {//blue mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4099) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4101) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4103) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4105) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4107) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4109) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4111) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4113) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4115) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 4117) {//mystic return 20; } if (ItemID == 3385) {//splitbark return 40; } if (ItemID == 3387) {//splitbark return 40; } if (ItemID == 3389) {//splitbark return 40; } if (ItemID == 3) {//splitbark return 40; } if (ItemID == 3393) {//splitbark return 40; } if (ItemID == 4716) {//dh helm return 70; } if (ItemID == 4720) {//dh body return 70; } if (ItemID == 4722) {//dh legs return 70; } if (ItemID == 4724) {//guthans helm return 70; } if (ItemID == 4728) {//guthans body return 70; } if (ItemID == 4730) {//guthans skirt return 70; } if (ItemID == 11142) {//3rd age legs return 70; } if (ItemID == 11143) {//3rd age body return 70; } if (ItemID == 11145) {//3rd age sheild return 70; } if (ItemID == 11134) {//3rd age range top return 70; } if (ItemID == 11135) {//3rd age range bottom return 70; } if (ItemID == 11136) {//3rd age range coif return 70; } if (ItemID == 11137) {//3rd age range vams return 70; } if (ItemID == 11138) {//3rd age mage top return 70; } if (ItemID == 11139) {//3rd age mage bottom return 70; } if (ItemID == 11140) {//3rd age mage hat return 70; } if (ItemID == 14860) {//neitizotz helm return 55; } if (ItemID == 2501) {//red d hide body return 40; } if (ItemID == 2499) {//blue d hide body return 40; } if (ItemID == 3751) {//berserker helm return 45; } if (ItemID == 3749) {//archer helm return 45; } if (ItemID == 3753) {//warrior helm return 45; } if (ItemID == 3755) {//farseers helm return 45; } if (ItemID == 1127) {//rune pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 1079) {//rune legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 1185) {//rune sq sheild return 40; } if (ItemID == 1201) {//rune kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 1093) {//rune skirt return 40; } if (ItemID == 1163) {//rune helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 5574) {//initiate helm return 20; } if (ItemID == 5575) {//initiate body return 20; } if (ItemID == 5576) {//initiate legs return 20; } if (ItemID == 15185) {//dragonfire sheild (visage) return 75; } if (ItemID == 15186) {//dragonfire sheild (visage) return 75; } if (ItemID == 13597) {//steel defender return 5; } if (ItemID == 13598) {//blk defender return 10; } if (ItemID == 13599) {//mithril defender return 20; } if (ItemID == 13600) {//addy defender return 30; } if (ItemID == 13601) {//rune defender return 40; } if (ItemID == 14638) {//torso return 40; } if (ItemID == 14635) {//fighter helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2619) {//rune g helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2615) {//rune g pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2617) {//rune g legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 2621) {//rune g kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 2627) {//rune t helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2623) {//rune t pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2625) {//rune t legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 2629) {//rune t kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 2613) {//addy g helm return 30; } if (ItemID == 2607) {//addy g pl8 return 30; } if (ItemID == 2609) {//addy g legs return 30; } if (ItemID == 2611) {//addy g kite return 30; } if (ItemID == 2605) {//addy t helm return 30; } if (ItemID == 2599) {//addy t pl8 return 30; } if (ItemID == 2601) {//addy t legs return 30; } if (ItemID == 2603) {//addy t kite return 30; } if (ItemID == 3483) {//gilded helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 3481) {//gilded pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 3483) {//gilded legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 3488) {//gilded kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 4131) {//rune boots return 40; } if (ItemID == 4129) {//addy boots return 30; } if (ItemID == 4127) {//mith boots return 20; } if (ItemID == 4125) {//blk boots return 10; } if (ItemID == 4123) {//steel boots return 5; } if (ItemID == 15345) {//Armadyl helm return 75; } if (ItemID == 15346) {//Armadyl chestplate return 75; } if (ItemID == 15347) {//Armadyl plateskirt return 75; } if (ItemID == 15348) {//bandos chestplate return 75; } if (ItemID == 15349) {//bandos tassets return 75; } if (ItemID == 15350) {//bandos boots return 75; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { //It's a weapon, weapons don't required defence ! } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWith("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthan") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { if (ItemName.endsWith("staff") || ItemName.endsWith("crossbow") || ItemName.endsWith("hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("flail") || ItemName.endsWith("warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("greataxe")) { //No defence for the barrow weapons } else { return 70; } } else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 1; } } return 1; }

EDIT: You may want to change the return ##:'s for your server, myn is set for 99 max skill
and for other skills if the CL(SKILL) isnt there, just copy the attack one and paste, delete the reqs and then change it around so it’s for the other skill! HOPE THIS HELPED![/quote]THANKS MAN! HELPPED A TON…

1 Problem. Prayer cape still has no reqs!

Can you figure out how to fix that for me?

Read full topic

Go into client.java, search for CLAttack untill you see something like this

/*Equipment level checking*/ public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 14073) { return 99; }

the CLAttack part is the skill,
then the part about item id and return is the items

if (ItemID == ####) { //#### here = the item ID
return ##; // the return ## is the level required to wear it in the skill your under,
}

Here’s myn all up-tpdate with new silabs for atk and defence

/*Equipment level checking*/ public int GetCLAttack(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } if (ItemID == 14073) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14074) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 14075) { return 99; } if (ItemID == 4151) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 1325) { return 5; } if (ItemID == 1311) { return 5; } if (ItemID == 1327) { return 10; } if (ItemID == 1313) { return 10; } if (ItemID == 1329) { return 20; } if (ItemID == 1315) { return 20; } if (ItemID == 1331) { return 30; } if (ItemID == 1317) { return 30; } if (ItemID == 1333) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 1319) { return 40; } if (ItemID == 4587) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 7158) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 5698) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 4153) { return 50; } if (ItemID == 6739) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 3204) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 1249) { return 60; } if (ItemID == 4747) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 4726) { return 70; } if (ItemID == 15333) { return 75; } if (ItemID == 15334) { return 75; } if (ItemID == 15335) { return 75; } if (ItemID == 15336) { return 75; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("halberd")) { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 60; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Combat Cape")) { return 99; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) { return 20; } else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) { return 1; } } return 1; } [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2008, 10:13:03 PM[/size][hr]DEFENCE

} if (ItemID == 2619) {//rune g helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2615) {//rune g pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2617) {//rune g legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 2621) {//rune g kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 2627) {//rune t helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 2623) {//rune t pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 2625) {//rune t legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 2629) {//rune t kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 2613) {//addy g helm return 30; } if (ItemID == 2607) {//addy g pl8 return 30; } if (ItemID == 2609) {//addy g legs return 30; } if (ItemID == 2611) {//addy g kite return 30; } if (ItemID == 2605) {//addy t helm return 30; } if (ItemID == 2599) {//addy t pl8 return 30; } if (ItemID == 2601) {//addy t legs return 30; } if (ItemID == 2603) {//addy t kite return 30; } if (ItemID == 3483) {//gilded helm return 40; } if (ItemID == 3481) {//gilded pl8 return 40; } if (ItemID == 3483) {//gilded legs return 40; } if (ItemID == 3488) {//gilded kite return 40; } if (ItemID == 4131) {//rune boots return 40; } if (ItemID == 4129) {//addy boots return 30; } if (ItemID == 4127) {//mith boots return 20; } if (ItemID == 4125) {//blk boots return 10; } if (ItemID == 4123) {//steel boots return 5; } if (ItemID == 15345) {//Armadyl helm return 75; } if (ItemID == 15346) {//Armadyl chestplate return 75; } if (ItemID == 15347) {//Armadyl plateskirt return 75; } if (ItemID == 15348) {//bandos chestplate return 75; } if (ItemID == 15349) {//bandos tassets return 75; } if (ItemID == 15350) {//bandos boots return 75; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); String ItemName2 = ItemName.replaceAll("Bronze", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Iron", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Steel", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Black", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Mithril", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Adamant", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Rune", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Granite", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Dragon", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("White", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.replaceAll("Crystal", ""); ItemName2 = ItemName2.trim(); if (ItemName2.startsWith("claws") || ItemName2.startsWith("dagger") || ItemName2.startsWith("sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("scimitar") || ItemName2.startsWith("mace") || ItemName2.startsWith("longsword") || ItemName2.startsWith("battleaxe") || ItemName2.startsWith("warhammer") || ItemName2.startsWith("2h sword") || ItemName2.startsWith("harlberd")) { //It's a weapon, weapons don't required defence ! } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Ahrims") || ItemName.startsWith("Karil") || ItemName.startsWith("Torag") || ItemName.startsWith("Verac") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthan") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharok")) { if (ItemName.endsWith("staff") || ItemName.endsWith("crossbow") || ItemName.endsWith("hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("flail") || ItemName.endsWith("warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("greataxe")) { //No defence for the barrow weapons } else { return 70; } } else { if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) { return 1; } else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) { return 1; } } return 1; }

EDIT: You may want to change the return ##:'s for your server, myn is set for 99 max skill
and for other skills if the CL(SKILL) isnt there, just copy the attack one and paste, delete the reqs and then change it around so it’s for the other skill! HOPE THIS HELPED!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @b3nj4m1n_8 b3nj4m1n_8
item.description:
@b3nj4m1n_8 wrote:

do this everyone else’s arent up to date.

   case 0: // Attack levelup

sendFrame164(6247);
stillgfx(199, absX, absY);
sendFrame126(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!”, 6248);
sendFrame126(“Your attack level is now “+playerLevel[0]+” .”, 6249);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level.”);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
if (playerLevel[0] >= 100) {
addItem(14073, 1);
addItem(14074, 1);
addItem(14075, 1);
sendMessage(“Congratulations, you just recived the Attack skill cape and hood!”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten “+ playerLevel[0] +” attack!");
}

item.dc:creator: @killer_2008 killer_2008
item.description:
@killer_2008 wrote:

Well is easy to make so some one get an item when they get 99 or other lvl search for the skill case in this case ill use defence

break; case 2: // Defence sendFrame164(6253); stillgfx(199, absX, absY); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level!", 6254); sendFrame126("Your defence level is now "+playerLevel[1]+" .", 6255); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a defence level."); NpcDialogueSend = true; if (playerLevel[1] >= 100) { addItem(10710, 1); addItem(10712, 1); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just recived the Defence skill cape and hood!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" has just gotten "+ playerLevel[2] +" defence!"); }

As you can see if player lvl [1] (Defence) is 100 he will he will get the item 10712 wich is a skillcape old id sorry… just put addItem (itemid,1); and thats all is easy
